response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value for us, but we believe it would also be a significant asset for you. Considering its importance and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you for $14,000. We are confident this price reflects both the quality of the product and its potential value to you. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 14000}
